messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/15/2003 2:03:44 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... Yes, we will. We re hoping to move in 18 months or so, so we re still here. ... Thanks! It s
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/15/2003 2:03:44 PM Eastern Standard Time,
SandraDodd@... writes:


> So...
> So you won't be in that house when the conference-time comes?

Yes, we will. We're hoping to move in 18 months or so, so we're still here.

> It has a beautiful kitchen. And a lovely roast pork.

Thanks! It's available! <G>

> So this year's SC conference is the last of its kind, and people REALLY
> better attend!

REALLY!!!!!

K
Kelly Lovejoy, Coordinator
Schools Out Support
